nodes.text: The Sprint-class rescue craft was a model of nimble starship. During the Clone Wars, the Galactic Republic's Space Rescue Corps most commonly used Sprint-class rescue crafts as well as Corellian rescue frigates for larger jobs.

The Sprint-class rescue craft was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in Rise of the Separatists, a 2019 supplement to Fantasy Flight Games' series of Star Wars roleplaying products. It was originally created for the Star Wars Legends continuity, where the ship was first mentioned in The Truce at Bakura Sourcebook, a 1996 supplement written by Kathy Tyers, Eric S. Trautmann and Bill Smith for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game.
